channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Airbnb is offering wannabe gladiators the chance to play-fight in Rome’s Colosseum. Romans aren’t happy about that

item.description: Monica Molenaar and Anne Fulenwider cofounded Alloy four years ago.

item.title: Elon Musk’s endorsement of a Treasury secretary candidate has reportedly rubbed Trump’s people the wrong way
item.description: Musk's post on X appears to put pressure on Trump.

item.title: Tesla jumps as Elon Musk’s ‘bet for the ages’ on Trump is seen paying off with federal self-driving rules
item.description: Tesla stock jumped after a report said Trump's transition team is prioritizing the creation of federal framework for fully autonomous cars.

item.title: U.S. home-builder confidence index hits seven-month high

item.description: Sitting out a tech revolution is simply not an option, writes Thomson Reuters CEO Steve Hasker.

item.title: Spirit Airlines says it will keep operating flights while in bankruptcy
